meanings.definition: Whosises: third person singular present of whosis
meanings.sent1: She whosises every morning before work.
meanings.sent2: He always whosises when he is nervous.
meanings.sent3: The cat whosises loudly when it wants attention.
meanings.sent4: The wind whosises through the trees on a stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The kettle whosises as it comes to a boil.

meanings.sent1: The whosises in the room were all talking at once.
meanings.sent2: I found many interesting whosises at the flea market.
meanings.sent3: The whosises on the farm were causing quite a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The whosises of the city never seemed to end.
meanings.sent5: The whosises in the library were all focused on their books.
